name: Droppy
short_description: Self-hosted file manager with upload, download, sharing, and collaboration features.
description: Droppy is a self-hosted file manager that provides an interface for uploading, downloading, organizing, and sharing files. Features include multi-file upload, folder creation, file preview, sharing via links, user authentication, activity log, and a clean responsive UI. Perfect for simple file hosting or sharing files with family and friends.
usecases: Share files with generate shareable links.
Upload and organize files through browser.
Simple file hosting for small groups.
